Help.help PAGE: Displays Help Message, specifying a page will show that help info. (Works in Direct Messages too.)
Displays information about the bot, it's creators, and where you can go if you would like to help code it.

Admin.changeprefix INSERT-SYMBOL: Changes the prefix the bot uses in your server. Available Symbols: `~!$%^&*()_+-={}[]|\:";\'<>?,.
Admin.createautorolemsg: Create the reactions for auto role assignment.
Admin.clear NUMBER(1-99): Bulk deletes the previous messages in a chat based on user input, up to 99 previous messages.
Admin.addmod MENTION-USERS: Adds users to the list of people that get the PM when someone whispers the bot with the !modmail command.
Fist time set up on a server. MUST HAVE SERVER ADMINISTRATOR STATUS.
Admin.set autorole/joinrole/general/music/modm: Allows you to change the settings you set during setup. MUST HAVE SERVER ADMINISTRATOR STATUS.

Fun.agify INSERT-NAME: Displays the names of which astronauts are aboard the ISS
Display a random quote, picked by the developers of Stormageddon.

Gaming.d2 status INSERT-BUNGIE-NAME: Displays Destiny 2 account's original creation date, and last API update date.
Gaming.d2 clan INSERT-CLAN-NAME: Displays Destiny 2 clan's bio, avatar, motto, and founder.

Music.play SEARCH-TEARM/YOUTUBE-LINK/YOUTUBE-P: Plays the selected music in the voice channel you are in, NOTE: Playlists have a maximum of 30 videos.
Music.volume 1-100: Sets the bots volume in percent.

PM.!modmail, SERVER-NAME, MESSAGE: Whisper via Stormageddon to all moderators for the specified server.
PM.!bugreport, MESSAGE: Whisper via Stormageddon to report a bug to the developers of Stormageddon.
